title: As a UK SME which produces naval equipment looking to expand my overseas defence business, I need to find out how to take part in DSO's Defence & Security Industry Days (held on vessels), so that I can give overseas military/govts a demonstration of my equipment installed on a military vessel (101974)

details.benefit: I can give overseas military/govts a demonstration of my equipment installed on a military vessel
details.goal: find out how to take part in DSO's Defence & Security Industry Days (held on vessels)
details.impact: Noticed only by an expert audience
justifications: It's something the government provides/does/pays for
details.role: UK SME which produces naval equipment looking to expand my overseas defence business
